com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.settings.plugin

Interface PluginSettings

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PluginSettingsImpl

    public interface PluginSettings
    The interface PluginSettings provides all settings used by the plug-in, but not needed for a check, like GUI language and logging settings.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static PluginSettings NULL
      The constant NULL is a null object singleton of PluginSettings.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Area getContextMenuPosition() 
      Locale getGuiLanguage() 
      File getLoggingDirectory() 
      org.apache.log4j.Level getLoggingLevel() 
      MarkingColor getMarkingColor(MarkingType markingType) 
      boolean isStepMode() 

    • Field Detail

      • NULL

        static final PluginSettings NULL
        The constant NULL is a null object singleton of PluginSettings.

    • Method Detail

      • getGuiLanguage

        Locale getGuiLanguage()
        Returns:
        The Locale of the Acrolinx Java SDK GUI.

      • getLoggingDirectory

        File getLoggingDirectory()
        Returns:
        The directory where the log should be written to.

      • getLoggingLevel

        org.apache.log4j.Level getLoggingLevel()
        Returns:
        the logging level of the Acrolinx Java SDK.

      • isStepMode

        boolean isStepMode()
        Returns:
        true, if the plug-in is in step mode, which means that the context menu keeps open after actions are performed.

      • getContextMenuPosition

        Area getContextMenuPosition()
        Returns:
        The position of the context menu, which is used to display the marking actions.

      • getMarkingColor

        MarkingColor getMarkingColor(MarkingType markingType)
        Parameters:
        markingType - The MarkingType a MarkingColor should be provided for.
        Returns:
        The MarkingColor for the MarkingType. If no Color is defined a default will be provided.
